mapper.sql: c.Id , c.JokesgId , c.VideosId , c.UserId , c.Content , c.InsertBy , c.InsertDate , c.UpdateBy , c.UpdateDate , c.Remarks , c.DelFlag , u.Id AS "user.Id" , u.Username AS "user.Username" , u.Password AS "user.Password" , u.Name AS "user.Name" , u.Nickname AS "user.Nickname" , u.Email AS "user.Email" , u.Phone AS "user.Phone" , u.Photo AS "user.Photo" , u.CompanyId AS "user.CompanyId" , u.IsCompany AS "user.IsCompany" , u.LoginIp AS "user.LoginIp" , u.LoginName AS "user.LoginName" , u.LoginTime AS "user.LoginTime" , u.Status AS "user.Status" , u.IsLogin AS "user.IsLogin" , u.InsertBy AS "user.InsertBy" , u.InsertDate AS "user.InsertDate", u.UpdateBy AS "user.UpdateBy" , u.UpdateDate AS "user.UpdateDate", u.Remarks AS "user.Remarks", u.DelFlag AS "user.DelFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM gg_comment c LEFT JOIN gg_user u ON c.UserId = u.Id WHERE c.DelFlag = #{delFlag} AND c.JokesgId = #{jokesgId} ORDER BY c.InsertDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gg_comment( JokesgId , VideosId , UserId , Content , InsertBy , InsertDate , UpdateBy , UpdateDate , Remarks , DelFlag )VALUES( #{jokesgId } , #{videosId } , #{userId } , #{content } , #{insertBy } , #{insertDate } , #{updateBy } , #{updateDate } , #{remarks } , #{delFlag } )
mapper.update: UPDATE gg_comment SET DelFlag = #{delFlag} WHERE Id = #{id} AND UserId = #{userId}
